snippet: A “Live From Lincoln Center” broadcast of “Curtain Up” documents a commemoration of the School of American Ballet’s 80th anniversary.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay Critic's Notebook applauds Live From Lincoln Center broadcast of Curtain Up: The School of American Ballet Workshop Performance, set to begin running on PBS in December; says well-produced series fills great need for broadcast performances by American dancers.
lead_paragraph: A “Live From Lincoln Center” broadcast of “Curtain Up” documents a commemoration of the School of American Ballet’s 80th anniversary.

headline.seo: ‘Live From Lincoln Center’ to Air ‘Curtain Up’
headline.main: A Performance Onstage Returns Anew on the Screen
